catentdesc.name: Sardines
catentdesc.longdescription: Lightly smoked, in olive oil. Sardines add that extra zing to a Ceasar salad. Did you know that sardines are nutritional powerhouses and are a great source of Omega-3's and protein?

catentdesc.name: Grade A Ground Beef
catentdesc.shortdescription: Farm fresh grade A ground beef.
catentdesc.longdescription: Grass fed organic grade A ground beef. Ground beef is great for pasta sauces hamburgers or lasagna. Lean ground using only the highest quality cuts and high in protein.

catentdesc.name: Atlantic Salmon Fillets
catentdesc.longdescription: Fresh caught Atlantic salmon, deboned and filleted. A high source of vitamin B12 and good fats. Delicious poached or grilled on a cedar plank.

catentdesc.name: Air Chilled Whole Chicken
catentdesc.longdescription: Fresh air chilled whole chicken. Whole chickens are delicious roasted, grilled or rotisseried. Free range and antibiotic free for a richer flavor.

catentdesc.name: Grass Fed Hamburgers
catentdesc.shortdescription: Organic grass fed ground beef patties.
catentdesc.longdescription: Make your next barbecue an effortless success with Madisons Choice burgers. Freshly ground and formed into large hamburger patties. Simply throw them on the grill and cook through.

catentdesc.name: Fillet Mignon
catentdesc.longdescription: Fillet mignon is considered to be the most tender cut of beef. So tender, it melts in your mouth. Cut from the tenderloin and naturally aged for 50 days. Fantastic grilled with salt and pepper.

catentdesc.name: Whole Fresh Red Snapper
catentdesc.longdescription: One of the most popular white fish. Red Snapper has a great, soft texture and a sweet, nutty flavor that lends itself very well to everything from citrus to subtle herbs.

catentdesc.name: Rack of Lamb
catentdesc.longdescription: Lamb is a delicious alternative to beef. Package contains a rack of eight chops. Great for grilling or roasting. Keep refrigerated before using.

catentdesc.name: Pork Chops
catentdesc.longdescription: Great grilled, fried or broiled. Lower in fat than a skinless chicken breast.

catentdesc.name: Seasoned Chicken Breasts
catentdesc.shortdescription: Ready to eat in ten minutes.
catentdesc.longdescription: All white meat chicken breasts perfectly seasoned with our own special blend of Italian herbs and spices. Simply toss on the grill, heat through and serve. Additional seasoning packet included.

catentdesc.name: Live Lobster
catentdesc.shortdescription: Straight from the ocean to you.
catentdesc.longdescription: Best served steamed, with melted garlic butter for dipping. All lobsters delivered live and as fresh as when caught directly to your door. Caught off the coast of Maine.
